full_summary:
Infrastructure Canada - Government of Canada
Tender Announcement for Superconducting Nanowire Single Photon Detectors and Electronics
---

### Tender Details

*   **Title:** Superconducting Nanowire Single Photon Detectors and Electronics
*   **Reference Number:** CB-203-53021304
*   **Solicitation Number:** 23-58153
*   **Tender Closing Date:** November 8, 2023 at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Number:** Amendment Number 5
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** November 30, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** February 29, 2024
*   **Tender Status:** Expired
*   **Classification ofProcurement:** Goods and Services
*   **Preconditions of participation:** None

### Procurement Information

The National Research Council (NRC) Security and Disruptive Technologies (SDT) Department is seeking Superconducting Nanowire Single Photon Detectors and Electronics. These are state-of-the-art devices that detect photons with unparalleled precision, making them an essential upgrade for the existing system with 4 detectors to 8 detectors,  and updating the electronics. This procurement is limited to companies registered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

### Regions of Opportunity

The procurement will be carried out in Ontario, with deliveries only taking place within the province.

### Required Equipment

Successful bidders will be required to supply Superconducting Nanowire Single Photon Detectors and the necessary Electronics for 8 detectors. The new components must be entirely compatible with the existing Photon Spot Cryospot 4 system.

### Contracting Information

The contracting officer is Kacendra Dion, who can be reached at:

*   **Email:** [Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca](mailto:Kacendra.Dion@cnrc-nrc.gc.ca)
*   **Phone:** (438) 324-8125

The tender package can be found on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/22941/
